text: Phera'unera sampradayera rsadarara balala, tumi ki emani chere debe musa o tara sampradayake. Desamaya hai-cai karara jan'ya ebam tomake o tomara deba-debike batila kare debara jan'ya. Se balala, ami ekhani hatya karaba tadera putra santanadigake; ara jibita rakhaba meyederake. Bastutah amara tadera upara prabala.
